name: Arc
description: A red vial, almost the color of blood. It provides enough energy to severely limit the toll the body takes from casting psychic powers.
effect: The effect takes 5 minutes to set in. The next psionic power cast after that has its cost limited to 3.
detriment: If no power is cast during the time, the user suffers \emph{Shock}.
overdose_effect: The user's Cassandra implant turns off for D5 days and the user suffers D10 damage (ignoring armor and toughness).
